item.title: Rights for data protection and administrative procedures
item.description:
Steve Peers A recent Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) decision in the cases of YS and M and S clarified data protection rights for asylum-seekers. This judgment could also have wider implications for accessing documents in administrative procedures. Two asylum-seekers in the Netherlands wanted to see file notes related to their cases.
